section.p: Convert to Internal Entity Dialog allows you to convert the selected document portion to an internal entity. To call this dialog make a selection and click Entity->Convert to Internal Entity... .
Type the new entity name and click OK. If an entity with the same name does not already exist, the selected document portion will be converted to an internal entity.

note.p: To convert the document portion back from an internal entity, use: Convert from Entity command: Entity Convert from Entity.
